words.chinese: vt. 仰慕, 钦佩 (=appreciate, honer, respect)
example: I [admire] people who are always honest with others.

words.chinese: n. [U] 仰慕, 欽佩 (=appreciation, honor, respect)
example: The public is full of [admiration] for the courageous soliders.

words.chinese: n. [C] 申請人, 應徵者 (=candidate)
example: All [applicants] for this job have to pass the written test before they can be interviewed.
Students who want to use the school lab should file an [application] first.

chinese: vt. 使用, 應用, 塗抹
example: I hope to find a job in which I can [apply] my expertise.
The [benefit] of watching movies at home is that ou can talk or laugh laudly loudly without bothering others.
Students have [benefited] from the teacher's excellent teaching methods.

words.chinese: adj. 有好處的 (=helpful, profitable, useful)
example: Exercising regularly is [beneficial] to your health.
The major was sentenced to ten years in jail for talking a [bribe].

words.chinese: vt. 計算 (=figure out, work out), 預測, 估計
example: The children learned to [calculate] numbers in math class.
The shop owner completes a daily [calculation] of the store's profits at the end of the day.
[Calculator] are useful when adding up multiple numbers.

chinese: vt. 使連結 (=attach, join), 使有關聯 (=associate,
vi. 連結, 接駁, 理解(=relate)
example: The computer is [connected] to the printer by a wire.

chinese: n. [C] 關連 (=association, relation, network), 關係(通常用複數形) (=relations), 通訊連結
example: There is a [connection] between heavy air pollution and a higher risk of developing lung cancer.

words.chinese: adv. 目前, 當下 (=now, at present, at the moment)
example: Michael is [currently] working as an accountant at his friend's company.

chinese: vt. 剪, 切, 割, 減少 (=decrease, reduce), 使簡短 (=shorten),
n. [C] 割傷 (=injury, wound), 減少 (=decrease, reduction), 剪, 切, 割 (當用單數形)
example: The cook [cut] the apple in half with a knife.
The employee received a pay [cut] because of his bad performance.

words.chinese: n. [C] 設備, 裝置 (=appliance, equipment, gear)
example: The [device] is designed to detect smoke in case of a fire.

words.chinese: vt. 排除, 阻擋 (=block, prevent), 排擠
example: Tom [excluded] Jenny from the guest list because they had just had a fight.
The gallery is holding an [exhibition] of sculptures made by local artists.

chinese: vt. 使結束 (=close, end), 完成 (=complete), 耗盡 (=consume, use up)
example: We neeed to work overtime to [finish] this project on time.

chinese: vt. 跟隨 (=pursue, track) 遵守 (=obay), 明白
example: Students must [follow] the school rules and wear their uniforms to school.

words.chinese: adj. 接著的, 下列的

chinese: vt. 打 (=beat, punch, strike), 撞擊 (bump into, crash) 擊中 (=shoot)
n. [C] 大受歡迎的人或事物 (=success), 襲擊
example: Henry had to stay in the hospital after he was [hit] by a car.
The popular signer released an album of this greatest [hits].
Wearing a helmet to protect your head while riding a bike is [important].

words.chinese: vt. 借(給), 提供 (幇助)
example: I won't [lend] Jason any money because he never pays it back.
Many teenagers lack [maturity] in handling difficult or emotional situations.
We hvbe been doing things in the same [manner] for years. Maybe it's time to make some changes.
It's convenient to use social [networking] apps to contact your friends nowadays.

chinese: adj. 公務的, 官方的, 公開的
example: The [offical] language of Taiwan is Mandarin.
Some government [officials] attended the opening ceremony of the new public library.
There are many [options] on the menu for you to choose from.

chinese: n. 人們 (person 的複數形)
example: [People] in Taiwan usually get together with their families on Chinese New Year Eve.
The advertisement in the new newspaper for a salesman said no [previous] experience was required.

words.chinese: vt. vi. 提議, 求婚
example: Wilson [proposed] to his girlfriend after a romantic candlelit dinner at a fancy restaurant.
The couple had a [quarrel] last week and haven't spoken to each other since.
The two little boys were [quarreling] about whose turn it was to play then video game
The dog barked at its [reflection] because it thought it was looking at another dog.

words.chinese: vt. vi. 反射, 反映

example: The boy jumped into the [river] and played in the water.

chinese: n. [C] [U] 徵兆, 跡象 (=clue, hint, signal)
n. [C] 標示 (=notice), 手勢 (=hand gesture), 符號
vt. vi. 簽(名), (向...)打手勢
example: You have to move your car because there's a [sign] here that says "No Parking"
Joe [signed] his name at the bottom of the letter.

words.chinese: adj. 真誠的, 誠摯的 (=earnest, genuine, honest)
example: Linda expressed her [sincere] apologies for the mistakes she had made.

words.chinese: n. [S][U] 工作人員, 工作團隊 (=crew, team)
example: There are over 50 fuil-time [staff] members at our company.
The magazine covers various [topics], such as sports, science, and current events.
It is [unlikely] that George will attend the party because he is too busy.
The [likelihood] of humans living on the moon is quite small.

chinese: vt. vi. 自願(做), 主動提出
example: Joseph is a volunteer at the library; he reads to the children.
Those kind-hearted people [volunteered] to clean up the mess caused by the typhoon.

chinese: adj. 自願的, 志願的

words.chinese: adj. 野生的, 瘋狂的, 猛烈的
example: This forest is home to various plants and [wild] annimals.
